text: haey( yeung ban tengtang) banda anakneasar muoychamnuon del yeung ban pnrnea chi vobr v tde robsa puokke brab anak( mou ham meat) pimoun nih ning banda anakneasar muoychamnuon tiet del yeung minban pnrnea chi vobr v te d robsa puokke brab anak . haey a l laoh ban mean bantoul cheamuoy mou sa daoy phtal
